name: Vallen Voss
bio: A half-elf revenant and enigmatic leader of the True Order, burdened with restoring the shattered legacy of Saâ€™dakar.

name: Ophelia
bio: A fierce tiefling warrior and former Sister of the Rose. Possesses a shard of the Blade and a hidden bloodline.

name: Ser Kaelen the Ashen
bio: A once-honorable knight turned zealot, now exiled after razing Ebonreach in pursuit of false prophecy.

name: Venya Ashveil
bio: A powerful mage of the Spire who seeks balance between order and knowledge. Known for tactical brilliance and cold resolve.
